item.title: Topic 1: Socrates
item.description: Reading (This section lists required readings and where to find them. For due dates, see the schedule page.) Plato, Apology, first part. Translated by GMA Grube. In Five Dialogues 2nd ed., pages 21â€“28. Or, see the PDF under Course Documents on Blackboard for a stopgap measure while you’re acquiring the books. See also (The items in this section are not required. They are just things you might be intersted in, if you would like to explore further.
